thread.title: Penelope Morgan

author: Penelope Morgan
title: Penelope Morgan
text:
Trusted house sitters uses a model which allows both house sitters and house owners to be reviewed. They encourage feedback which makes it easier to build a good reputation on both sides of the equation.
The website guides home owners to provide a 'manual' of information for a sitter which is extremely helpful (particularly when house/pet sitting in a different country). I have not had to use it but they also offer a 24 hour helpline in case there are any problems with pets.
The website is easy to navigate and the cost is reasonable. I really appreciate the opportunities it has open ends up for me.
